meanings.definition: A plant of the parsley family with a large, bulbous, edible base.
meanings.sent1: The finochio in the garden had a big, round base.
meanings.sent2: I harvested some fresh finochio for our salad.
meanings.sent3: The finochio whispered to the carrots, 'I'm the roundest of all!'
meanings.sent4: The finochio stood proudly among the other vegetables like a king on his throne.
meanings.sent5: The finochio's bulb was so plump and inviting, it begged to be eaten.

meanings.definition: The bulb of the fennel plant, used as a vegetable.
meanings.sent1: The chef sliced the finochio bulb for the stir-fry.
meanings.sent2: The finochio bulb added a unique flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The finochio bulb rolled off the counter and into the soup pot!
meanings.sent4: Herbs danced around the finochio bulb, enhancing its natural essence.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the finochio bulb filled the kitchen, making mouths water.
